Key Match Events: Brazil and Costa Rica played to a 0-0 draw in their Copa America Group D opener on June 25, 2024, at SoFi Stadium in Los Angeles with 67,158 fans in attendance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at SoFi Stadium in Inglewood, California, with Brazil and Costa Rica each holding a point after the first round of the tournament.
Others: The match was broadcast on FS1 and had a line of BRA -2.5 and an over/under of 3.5.
